Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2008 07:57PM mic wrote: Hi, am quite shocked that the doctor did not give you the option of a mastecomy, as I am only 33 years old and have DCIS, they have found two area's of calicifactions and I am going in for a mastectomy on the 16th Jan, am so scared, there is a chance of 10% apparently that it has spread, am also getting my lymph nodes removed as a precaution. The doctor is going to make the decsion on the day as to whether I have an expander or an implant. If anyone has been in this situation please share your your experience.
Posts.Title: DCIS my story karluway mic
